content: knitted christmas bauble in drops cotton merino the piece is worked back and forth in garter stitch and stripes/spiral theme christmas drops design pattern cm-164 yarn group b #dropsmerrymints **size** diameter = 6 cm **yarn ** drops cotton merino from garnstudio 50 g colour 01 off white 50 g colour 06 cherry red 1 bauble weighs approx 10 g without wadding **accessories** wadding drops glitter or left-over strand for loop **needles** drops single pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 48 row in height with garter stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm
